name: Agga Pop
description:
Agga Pop is the bubble popping puzzle game.

The goal of the game is to get as many bubbles home as possible, however the only way to move a bubble is to pop another bubble next to it. Its the explosive POP that pushes other bubbles around.

Okay got it, we start off with some simple rounds to get you going but later levels are a little more challenging.

You may need to plan ahead or carefully time your bubble popping activities, alternatively just pop everything in sight and keep your fingers crossed! Both techniques are equally rewarding.

Frustratingly simple, but immensely rewarding download Agga Pop now.
